game.name: Project Lounge
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Project Lounge is a 3D social game that encourages people to socialize in enviroments full of interactable objects such as drawboards, vinyl players and even arcade machines!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Project Lounge is a 3D social game that encourages people to socialize in enviroments full of interactable objects such as drawboards, vinyl players and even arcade machines!

reviewHighlights.text: Project Lounge feels like someone trapped a chill Sunday afternoon inside a video game. Half the time I’m vibing, the other half I’m questioning my li...
